comments.body: i'm guessing from the comment above that you also have to add a test in this file somewhere as part of this, otherwise this class sort of loses its purpose :-)
Thanks! I only caught it because this test was failing before I remember to override `==` and `hashValues` in `TabBarTheme`.
nit: this line looks like it could really use some line breaks...
This test just checks the original 2014 text styles (still the default). It's now a regression test. Will add a comment to that effect.
